1167200.name: Meiro Demo
1167200.description:
This demo shows where we are at right now in development. We have made great progress over the last year, and we hope you will enjoy playing this short update.
With your support and ideas we hope to make a fun multiplayer survival maze experience!

Currently, you can play the save zone which we call the habitat and complete a sequence of quests.
You can freely build, craft and explore the destroyed village and uncover the beginning of the story.

Please note that the demo is only a part of the full game!
  • The demo does not feature the maze yet
  • Only a limited amount of quests is available. More will follow soon.
1167200.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
